channel.title: Linux on Standing DevOps
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Standing DevOps

item.title: Today I had some fun with cows saying fortunes
item.description: Today I had some fun with cows saying fortunes. If you are not in the Linux world, it will seem like I’ve been smoking some strange Dalmatian herbs, but if you have played at all with Linux you’ll know this happy face: _________________________________________ / You will be reincarnated as a toad; and \ \ you will be much happier. / ----------------------------------------- \ (__) (oo) /------\/ / | || * /\---/\ ~~ ~~ Now, who said geeks don’t know how to have fun?
